name: Consortium of European Social Science Data Archives
goal: CESSDA provides large-scale, integrated and sustainable data services to the social sciences. It brings together social science data archives across Europe, with the aim of promoting the results of social science research and supporting national and international research and cooperation. CESSDA ERIC wants to be a key player in the social sciences domain providing: (a) a trusted platform with tools and services to curate, publish and reuse research data; and (b) training to the research community throughout the research life cycle.
interests: Communication, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: open science, open data, open access, data protection, new data technologies, big data, FAIR data
